original_text: I have moved about to many different places with the Israelites. I chose leaders to take care of my people, like shepherds take care of their sheep. But I never said to any of them, ‘You should have built a beautiful house of cedar wood for me.’ ”
korean_text: 이스라엘 무리와 더불어 가는 모든 곳에서 내가 내 백성을 먹이라고 명령한 이스라엘 어느 사사에게 내가 말하기를 너희가 어찌하여 내 백향목 집을 건축하지 아니하였느냐고 말하였느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: I have moved about to many different places
to take care of my people
like shepherds take care of their sheep
But I never said to any of them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그들 중 누구에게도 말한 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: 'You should have built a beautiful house'
